data.prayer: Spirit, supernaturally prepare encounters with the gospel on sites like Facebook and Instagram for the 63,700 people living in San Andrés y Providencia.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of San Andrés y Providencia, Colombia
data.section_summary: What beauty can God be thanked for in this photo?

data.prayer: Spirit, protect the overcomers in San Andrés y Providencia, Colombia, so that they will one day sit with Jesus on His throne.
data.verse: He who overcomes, I will give to him to sit down with me on my throne, as I also overcame, and sat down with my Father on his throne.

data.prayer: God, we pray for the believers in San Andrés y Providencia, Colombia to be generous so that they would be worthy of greater investment by you.
Please, teach the 6,836 believers in San Andrés y Providencia, Colombia how to pray to you and how to listen for your voice. That they might follow you into the good works you have prepared for them.
data.verse: My sheep listen to my voice; I know them, and they follow me.

data.prayer: Lord God, I thank you that the blood of Christ, who through the eternal Spirit offered himself without defect to God, can cleanse the Passe people conscience from dead works to serve the living God.
Father, we pray that the state of San Andrés y Providencia be filled with simple churches in every neighborhood.
data.verse: For the earth will be full of the knowledge of the Lord, as the waters cover the sea.

data.prayer: Father, make bold the prophets in San Andrés y Providencia, Colombia so that the church can be equipped with truth and insight and a vision of your heart.
data.verse: These are the things which you should do: speak the truth to one another; judge with truth and judgment for peace in your gates.

data.prayer: Spirit, help the church in the state of San Andrés y Providencia do things that will multiply their numbers, not just add to them.
data.verse: But thanks be to God, who always leads us triumphantly as captives in Christ and through us spreads everywhere the fragrance of the knowledge of Him.

location.name: San Andrés y Providencia
